title: Process a Return for Refurbishment
description: A returned electronic item is not resalable as-is but can be refurbished. It needs to be routed to the refurbishment department.

tasks.description: During the returns inspection process, an operator grades the item's condition as 'Requires Refurbishment'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The item is given the correct disposition code.

tasks.description: The system creates a transfer order to move the item from the returns area to the refurbishment work center.
tasks.expected_outcome: A task is generated to move the item internally.

tasks.description: The item's inventory status is changed to 'In Refurbishment', making it unavailable for sale.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system accurately reflects the item's current, non-sellable status.
